Title: Requiem for Mrs. J
Actors: Mirjana Karanovic, Danica Nedeljkovic, Jovana Gavrilovic, Vucic Perovic
Plot: Mrs. J is depressed by the death of her husband, who passed away one year ago and she is planning to commit suicide as she can't deal with the problems of her family.
Country: Serbia, Bulgaria, Republic of Macedonia, Russia, France, Germany
